Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Manchester in 1984...
Injured on 5/26/1984 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 6/2/1984 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/14/1984 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/8/1985, off Harold Miller (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/21/1985, off Von Hebert (PG)...
Drove in 8 runs against Longport on 7/7/1987...
Injured on 6/3/1988 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/14/1988 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/20/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $4,250,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 4/8/1991...
Injured on 5/25/1991 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1991, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
